profile:
Hello and welcome to Repair Care! Thank you for considering us for your appliance repair needs. As homeowners ourselves we know how stressful it can be when something we depend on isn't in working order. As such, we want to be part of the solution and not add to the problem. At RepairCare strive to be fair, professional and ethical at all times, keeping customer service at the forefront of all we do. We are committed to providing a high level of quality service we can stand behind. Thank you for choosing RepairCare. We appreciate your business.

We are proud of our mission statement:
We Strive to be: FAIR PROFESSIONAL & ETHICAL, Keeping CUSTOMER SERVICE at the forefront of all that we do! going ABOVE & BEYOND when we can. Sometimes we don’t get It RIGHT but we are committed to making It RIGHT!
service_area:
RepairCare provides services in the following cities and surrounding areas:

Toronto - Ajax, Aurora, Brampton, Barrie, Hamilton, North York, Richmond Hill, Markham, Mississauga Oshawa, Whitby & More.

Ottawa - Castle Heights, Carlington, Ellwood, Forbes, Kenson Park, Heron Park, Riverview, Redwood, Vanier, Sheffield Glen & More.

Calgary - Airdrie, Cochrane, Foothills, Okotoks, Rocky View County, Chestermere, Langdon, Strathmore, Cranston, De Winton & More.

Edmonton - Leduc, Gibbons, Beaumont, Devon, Ft. Saskatchewan, St. Albert, Spruce Grove, Sherwood Park, Nisku, Morinville & More.

Vancouver - Richmond, Burnaby, Surrey, Delta, Langley. Coquitlam, Maple Ridge, Abbotsford, Mission, White Rock & More.

brands:
Repair Care services all major appliance brands and our vast knowledge of each one allows us to serve you better! We work with the following brands: 
Bosch, Electrolux, Fisher & Paykel, Frigidaire, KitchenAid, Kenmore, Magic Chef, Maytag, Miele, Sub Zero, Thermador, Viking, Westinghouse, Whirlpool, Wolf and more. Our dedication to appliance repair sets us apart. Our skilled technicians span over numerous brands and understand issues specific to each one. RepairCare know what it can be like to have an appliance on the fritz, but worry not because our team is on it! We come equipped with the parts we need for each appliance and appliance brand.
specialities: RepairCare specializes in Fridge, Stove, Oven, Mixer, Dishwasher, Washer, Dryer, Appliance repairs regardless of make, model or style. We have a team of skilled technicians on standby ready to help you today. Our same day and emergency repair is outstanding. Repair Care technicians are easily able to determine and diagnose the cause of your appliance’s malfunction and eagerly await your call. Our vans are loaded and ready to go with all the parts you need for your major appliance. We specialize in all areas of your appliance repair needs. Many times, there are common, easy solutions to your appliance’s malfunction and our technicians are able to quickly fix the problem. Choose RepairCare to get the job done right!
